name: Web3 Expresso machine
shortDescription: The World's First Web3 Blockchain-Powered Espresso Machine!
description:
Introducing the "CryptoBrew 3000 - The World's First Web3 Blockchain-Powered Espresso Machine! 
 The CryptoBrew 3000 is not your average espresso machine; it's a caffeinated masterpiece of the future. Experience decentralized bean sourcing, where premium, ethically-sourced beans are tracked through the blockchain. Our Proof of Espresso (PoE) protocol ensures every shot is authentic, like sipping a digital NFT of flavor. DeFi dosing calculates the perfect bean-to-water ratio, and CoffeeCoin integration lets you mine tokens with each brew. 
 Our CryptoConnect app keeps you connected and even lets you mint limited edition NFT brew styles. Enjoy blockchain-verified brew history, and relish the ideal milk froth with blockchain precision. Join the coffee revolution; get your CryptoBrew 3000 today. It's not just a coffee maker; it's a lifestyle upgrade for the blockchain-savvy caffeine connoisseur-
